list-item.p: The therapy, especially in the advanced stages, seems complicated, and we are waiting the outcome of several hundreds of clinical trials, often duplicated and non-coordinated. Major drugs are mostly non-viral-specific: hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir, remdesivir, convalescent plasma/monoclonal antibody, camostat, and ivermectin. New drug development is clearly the first priority.
The role of immunity is crucial both to overcame the acute phase and for establishing the vaccine.
Exit from the acute phase and establishing the new protocol for the post-acute phase is of utter priority.
